meanings.sent1: The tree branches were juttying out over the fence.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraper was juttying into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat was juttying its paw out to catch the toy.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was juttying out in every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was juttying against the clear blue sky.

meanings.sent1: The castle had many juttying towers.
meanings.sent2: The cliff had a dangerous juttying edge.
meanings.sent3: The juttying of the rock formation made it look like a face.
meanings.sent4: The juttying of the roof created a cozy nook.
meanings.sent5: The juttying of the peninsula made it a perfect spot for fishing.
